page.title: 08SCHOOL TRANSPORT LOWESWATER
page.content: There is no public transport service in this area. The school-children are taken to and from school in a special mini-bus which collects the children from 8.10/8/15 a.m. It drops the primary school children at Lorton school about 8.40 a.m. and then goes onto Cockermouth, where it drops off the Secondary School children at Derwent School about 9.00 a.m. The primary school day ends at 3.15 in the afternoon and the mini-bus brings the children back home between 3.30 and 4.00 p.m. The Derwent Schoo; pupils finish at 3.45 p.m. and a separate mini-bus brings these 17 children home between 4.15 and 4.30 p.m.
